periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 3am, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 65, with temperatures rising to around 67 overnight. South southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Monday
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 10am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 78, with temperatures falling to around 76 in the afternoon. South wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 66, with temperatures rising to around 68 overnight. South wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 10am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 78. South southwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 65. South southeast wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 77. East wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Thursday

periods.name: Friday

periods.name: Saturday
